content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Electricity Generation Setup
Consists of:
- Solar Panels (quantity: 0)
- Steam Engines (quantity: 0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to no ingredients in furnaces
- Ensure that the furnaces have the necessary ingredients to operate. Check the inventory and supply lines to ensure they are adequately stocked.

### Errors when crafting solar panels and steam engines
- Verify that you have the required materials to craft solar panels and steam engines. Collect the necessary resources before attempting to craft these items.

### General Tips
- Regularly check your inventory and the status of your structures to ensure they are functioning optimally.
